title: Season 6 provisionals broken?
body: Just saw someone i know go from platinum 4 to silver 2 after winning 6 of their provisionals, anyone else seen such drastic drops like this?

replies.body:
people try and say they had bad mmr

apparently everyone ive seen has nowhere near the mmr they play at then...

All seemingly heaps lower than they play at.
He probably had really bad mmr other wise he would of dropped to gold instead.
Yeah.. I was Gold 2 won 9/10 and got Silver 1..
